pbcoreDescription.description: B&W silent; Appears to be newsreel footage of attempts at cross-Atlantic flights; includes fiery crash and Lindbergh; rest of reel family home movies
"POP-WALTERâ€™S HORSES" in marker on top of canister. On inner bottom canister, much blue powdery oxidation. Strong odor of moth balls inside canister.
2 films - Lindbergh film first - yellow (but crisp) - rest of film B&W looks good.
Round 1 - 16mm Digitizer - MTS Files, masked, converted to black and white, exported as H264 files

pbcoreContributor.contributor: home movie footage created by father of Warren Weiant, donor of films
